series.title: Valdemar: Arrows of the Queen
series.description: A series set in Valdemar. It is followed by By the Sword and Mage Winds.

series.title: Valdemar (Chronological)
series.description: This series lists the books in the Valdemar universe according to their internal chronology. It is unnumbered because there are still books being written early in the chronology. It includes the series, in order: * Mage Wars * The Last Herald-Mage * Collegium Chronicles * The Herald Spy * Vows & Honor * Exile * Arrows of the Queen * Mage Winds * Mage Storms * Darien's Tale It also includes standalone books within this world (Take a Thief, Brightly Burning, and By the Sword) in their chronological order. The Valdemar Short Stories are not placed on this series listing. See also: Valdemar (Publication order).

series.title: Valdemar (Publication order)
series.description: This series listing gives the Valdemar books in publication order. For the books and subseries in chronological order, see Valdemar (Chronological). Note: stand-alone short stories and omnibuses/box sets are not included in this listing, but Valdemar anthologies are listed. For short stories, see Tales of Valdemar.
